title: AGRIC RENTAL BUSINESS: The Business Of Renting Farming Equipment

tasks.task: Renting agricultural machinery and equipment to maize farmers.
subtasks: Purchasing maize planters and renting them to small-scale farmers (50-100 GH₵ per acre).
Renting plowing machines (250-300 GH₵ per acre) and scheduling work for 50 acres per day over four months.
Renting spraying machines (15-10 GH₵ per day) and calculating profit from multiple machines over four months.
Renting maize treasure machines (harvesting and processing) in towns, serving farming communities within reach.
Calculating potential revenue and profit from each equipment type based on local market rates and usage.

tasks.task: Renting agricultural machinery and equipment to maize farmers in Ghana.
subtasks: Acquire and maintain maize planters for rental (costing around 50-100 GH₵ per acre rented).
Acquire and maintain plowing machines for rental (costing around 250-300 GH₵ per acre rented).
Acquire and maintain spraying machines for pesticide application (costing around 15 GH₵ per day per machine).
Acquire and maintain maize treasure harvesters for post-harvest processing (costing around 500 GH₵ per machine).
Market and schedule rental services for these machines, targeting small-scale maize farmers.
